Posts.Content: Oct 21, 2009 01:47AM bcamnb wrote: Are you all airing your breasts for a minimum of an hour a day? Also, I was given glaxal cream and instructed to apply it 2 - 3 x /day. Consequently, no burns. But almost had a problem AFTER rad finished. So don't let up on airing and creaming.
Posts.Title: Severe radiation burns to the breast RCindy
